'''Kappa''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who first appeared in ''[[Akitsu Kimodameshi]]''. He is a [[youkai]] who is close friends with [[Hitotsume Kozou]] and [[Youko]].

===Appearance===
Kappa takes the form of a young boy with pale skin and short black hair. He appears to wear a green mask with droopy eyes and a yellow beak-like mouth, a spiky leaf hat, and a small turtle shell. He also dons an olive-colored shirt, pants, and sandals.
